name: The Whopper Challenge
description:
"Whopper, Whopper, Whopper, Whopper
Junior, Double, Triple Whopper
Flame-grilled taste with perfect toppers
I rule this day
Lettuce, mayo, pickle, ketchup
It's okay if I don't want that
Impossible or bacon Whopper
Any Whopper my way" - Burger King, Whopper Whopper Whopper.

Get ready to show off your burger-making skills in The Whopper Challenge! In this exciting game, you'll take on the role of a chef at Burger King, tasked with creating the perfect Whopper burger. You'll have to choose the right ingredients, cook the patties to perfection, and assemble the burger just right to impress the judges.

But it's not just about making a great burger - you'll also have to race against the clock to complete your burger before time runs out. The faster you are, the higher your score will be. And as you progress through the game, the challenges will get harder, with more ingredients to choose from and more complex burger designs to create.

With its fun gameplay, colorful graphics, and catchy soundtrack, The Whopper Challenge is sure to keep you entertained for hours. So get ready to step into the kitchen and take on the ultimate burger-making challenge!

Assets: https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-trippy-animated-background
